remarks.format: ## Remarks 基实现呈现 `` 具有给定特性的标记。The base implementation renders a `` tag with the given attributes. 继承适配器可以重写此方法，并在调用基实现之前修改特性的字典。Inheriting adapters can override this method and modify the dictionary of attributes before calling the base implementation. 此 API 已废弃不用。This API is obsolete. 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 的移动应用和站点](https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview)。For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see [Mobile apps and sites with ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用了两次。This method is called twice. 在第一次调用时，编写器参数为 `null` ，并且方法将返回 `true` 或 `false` ，指示它是否有 `` 要写入的其他元素。On the first call, the writer parameter is `null`, and the method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether or not it has additional `` elements to write. 在第二次调用时，方法使用提供的编写器写入内容。On the second call, the method writes the content by using the provided writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一个链接写入输出流。This method writes a link to the output stream. 链接将出现在分页窗体上，以使用户能够在窗体的页面之间导航。The link appears on paginated forms to enable to the user to navigate between a form's pages.
